message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount.  Accept this and we both get something.
I'm willing to split the money more evenly, as I think this will be a better starting point for our negotiations. We both have a lot to gain from a fair agreement.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make it worth my while.  Let's work towards a solution that benefits both of us.
